note:
I'm a programmer, gamer, father, husband.
I've been programming (avidly) for over 30 years now.
l also love film and music, and I try to constantly seek out new genres.
I love reading (hard) Sci-Fi, fantasy, and horror, but am also avidly interested in math and physics.
I play squash and Go (7kyu), can juggle, and am an insatiable collector of mechanical keyboards and retro computing.

fields.name: Favorite Font
fields.value: The one I designed and loaded for my C64 when I was 10

fields.name: Favorite Band
fields.value: Can't pick one anymore... still discovering new genres!
